scripts.package: yarn build; pkg package.json; mv ./pkg/2b2w-ts-rewrite-linux ../../rust/server_auth_backend/static/2b2w-ts-rewrite-linux-x64; mv ./pkg/2b2w-ts-rewrite-win.exe ../../rust/server_auth_backend/static/2b2w-ts-rewrite-win64-x64.exe
scripts.nccbuild: ncc build src/index.ts -o ncc --target es2022 -e 'ts-luxon' -e 'node-fetch' -e 'everpolate' -e 'eventemitter2' -e 'strict-event-emitter-types' -e 'mineflayer' -e 'prismarine-auth' -e 'minecraft-data' -e 'minecraft-folder-path' -e '@discordx/importer' -e '@nxg-org/mineflayer-antiafk' -e '@nxg-org/mineflayer-auto-eat' -e '@rob9315/mcproxy' -e 'discord.js' -e 'discordx' -e 'joi' -e 'ts-deepmerge' -e 'eslint' -e 'protodef' -e 'prismarine-nbt' -e 'minecraft-protocol' -d && cp ./ncc/index.js ../../rust/server_auth_backend/static/2b2w-raw.js
